content:
Hi everyone,

Google UX Research team is conducting a survey to better understand FHIR implementers' needs and challenges. We would like to invite you to complete an anonymous survey to share your experience working with FHIR. It should take no longer than 15 minutes to complete the survey.

Survey link: https://google.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_d43SPOXFAtQkhL0

Thank you for your consideration!

Cheers,
Leslie
Just a note that the survey appears to be limited to only users based in the U.S. or UK.

Yes - when I said that I wasn't in either US or UK, I got :

We thank you for your time spent taking this survey.
Your response has been recorded.

Not sure what the recorded response was!
My apologies for the bug in survey logic; It's been fixed. Thank you for flagging @David Hay @Lloyd McKenzie !

The survey intro says

The raw data will only be shared with the research team, and the results of the survey will be published in a research publication.

Will the 'research publication' be open access (ie free to view & download)?
Yes, it will be open access. Thanks for asking!
